sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: Dealing damage has a high chance to grant you a dose of Venomous Potential. At 5 doses, inject them into your target to deal 201,664 Nature damage over 3 sec.

Dealing Nature damage has a chance to grant you an additional dose.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Receive cryptic instructions from somewhere in the Twisting Nether to reveal your next task. It's probably nothing, so complete it to gain 14,522 Agility for 15 sec.  (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Use: Increases your Mastery by 6,939 for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
